name: Slimey Slimes
description:
Squish, splat, split and merge your way to victory.

Made for GMTK Jam 2021

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Split: Q

Join: E

Restart Level: R

Music:

"Bleeping Demo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
